meaningMnemonic: You are a strong, independent person and you are the only one who can <kanji>manipulate</kanji> your <kanji>chastity</kanji>. Nobody else can. So if you want to keep your <vocabulary>chastity</vocabulary> that's completely up to you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
